haberman.rhizomatics.data

Class DataManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.database.sqlite.SQLiteOpenHelper
      • haberman.rhizomatics.data.DataManager

  • public class DataManager
extends android.database.sqlite.SQLiteOpenHelper
    This class extends SQLiteOpenHelper and allows data-driven map features creation. It acts as a intermediate between a live data API (currently hard-coded under R.raw.) and the end-user interactions.

        public static java.util.ArrayList<PlaceEntity> remove_farthest_place(PlaceEntity reference,
                                                                     java.util.ArrayList<PlaceEntity> places)
        Given a list of PlaceEntitys and a reference point, returns the same list without its farthest location.
        Parameters:
        reference - The LatLng reference's point
        places - A list of LatLng to compare
        Returns:
        The filtered list.

      • min_distance_place

        public static float min_distance_place(com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.geometry.LatLng reference,
                                       java.util.ArrayList<PlaceEntity> places)
        Returns the minimum distance between a reference point and a list of PlaceEntitys.
        Parameters:
        reference - The reference point to measure the distance from
        places - A list of PlaceEntity
        Returns:
        The maximum distance in meters.

      • nearest_place_list

        public static java.util.ArrayList<PlaceEntity> nearest_place_list(@NonNull
                                                                  com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.geometry.LatLng reference,
                                                                  @NonNull
                                                                  java.util.ArrayList<PlaceEntity> places,
                                                                  short amount)
        Returns a given amount list of PlaceEntitys being the nearest of a given reference.
        Parameters:
        reference - The location of the reference point
        places - A list of PlaceEntity to compare
        amount - The amount of locations to retrieve
        Returns:
        The list of the closest locations found.

      • nearest_place

        @Nullable
private static PlaceEntity nearest_place(com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.geometry.LatLng reference,
                                                   java.util.ArrayList<PlaceEntity> places)
        Given a list of locations, returns the nearest geographical coordinates of a reference point.
        Parameters:
        reference - The location of the reference point
        places - A list of LatLng to compare
        Returns:
        The nearest location in the list or null if places is empty.

        columns - A list of columns that describes the table
        types - The corresponding sql types of columns
        Returns:
        The sql query.

      • all_places

        @Nullable
public java.util.ArrayList<PlaceEntity> all_places()
        Fetches all places stored in the PLACE_TABLE table. The result of a first retrieval is cached inside places_.
        Returns:
        An array of PlaceEntity or null if there is no result.

        Returns:

public final SoundEntity inside_sound(@NonNull
                                                java.lang.String place_id)
        Returns all sounds of "inside" type.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        A SoundEntity or null if there is no result.
